articles.description: Royal Enfield’s most recent salvo came in the form of the Himalayan 450 and it created a buzz that exceeded our expectations. It is the Chennai-based brand’s biggest launch so far and also one of the highlights in its product portfolio.

articles.author: Asmita Pant
articles.title: Hero MotoCorp records highest-ever festive sales, sells 14 lakh units - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The homegrown auto company clocked more than 14 lakh units in retail sales during the festive period, a 19% growth over the previous year. This was above the previous highest sale of 12.7 lakh units in the corresponding festive period of 2019.

articles.author: Shashank Pathak
articles.title: Fertility monitor app Inito raises $6 Mn led by Fireside - Entrackr
articles.description: Medical technology startup Inito has raised $6 million in a Series A round led by Fireside Ventures.
